original_title: Ride Like Lightning, Crash Like Thunder
overview: Through softly textured 16mm photography and regional iconography, Silva offers a modernist reflection on two of upstate New York’s most storied 19th century touchstones—the landscape painters of the Hudson River School and the legend of Rip Van Winkle—nodding to a few musical heroes along the way.
title: Ride Like Lightning, Crash Like Thunder
